queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| where !isBlank(bytesfromserver) and !isBlank(bytesfromclient)
| timeslice 5m
| sum(bytesfromserver) as bytes_server, sum(bytesfromclient) as bytes_client by _timeslice
| bytes_server + bytes_client as bytes_total
| bytes_total / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes_total
| outlier gbytes_total threshold=4

panels.title: Top 15 Maximum Elapsed Time by Zones

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| where !(isBlank(elapsedtime))
| max(elapsedtime) as max_elapsedtime_sec by sourcezonename, destzonename
| sort max_elapsedtime_sec, sourcezonename, destzonename
| limit 15

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| where !(isBlank(elapsedtime))
| avg(elapsedtime) as avg_elapsedtime_sec

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| where !isBlank(bytesfromserver) and !isBlank(bytesfromclient)
| sum(bytesfromserver) as bytes_server, sum(bytesfromclient) as bytes_client by sourcezonename, destzonename
| bytes_server + bytes_client as bytes_total
| bytes_total / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes_total
| sort gbytes_total, sourcezonename, destzonename
| fields -bytes_server, bytes_client, bytes_total
| limit 15

panels.title: Bandwidth Served by Client and Server

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| where !isBlank(bytesfromserver) and !isBlank(bytesfromclient)
| timeslice 1m
| count(*) as count, sum(bytesfromserver) as bytes_server, sum(bytesfromclient) as bytes_client by _timeslice
| bytes_server / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes_server
| bytes_client / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes_client
| fields -bytes_server, bytes_client

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| sum(bytesfromclient) as bytes_client
| bytes_client / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes_client
| fields -bytes_client

panels.title: Top 20 Longest Session Elapsed Time by Internal Destination

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| parse "session-id-32=\"*\"" as sessionId
| if(compareCIDRPrefix("10.0.0.0", destip, toInt(8)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("172.16.0.0", destip, toInt(12)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("192.168.0.0", destip, toInt(16)), "Private", "Public") as ip_type
| where ip_type matches "Private"
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| max(elapsedtime) as max_elapsedtime_sec by destip
| sort max_elapsedtime_sec
| limit 20

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=sourceip
| count by destip, latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

panels.title: Top 20 Internal Destinations With the Most Sessions

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| parse "session-id-32=\"*\"" as sessionId
| if(compareCIDRPrefix("10.0.0.0", destip, toInt(8)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("172.16.0.0", destip, toInt(12)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("192.168.0.0", destip, toInt(16)), "Private", "Public") as ip_type
| where ip_type matches "Private"
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| count by sessionId, destip | count as sessions by destip
| sort sessions
| limit 20

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| where !(isBlank(elapsedtime))
| timeslice 3m
| avg(elapsedtime) as avg_elapsedtime_sec by _timeslice
| outlier avg_elapsedtime_sec

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=destip
| count by destip, latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| sum(bytesfromserver) as bytes_server
| bytes_server / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes_server
| fields -bytes_server

panels.title: Top 20 Internal Src IPs by GBytes to Public Dest IPs

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| parse "session-id-32=\"*\"" as sessionId
| if(compareCIDRPrefix("10.0.0.0", destip, toInt(8)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("172.16.0.0", destip, toInt(12)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("192.168.0.0", destip, toInt(16)), "Private", "Public") as dest_ip_type
| if(compareCIDRPrefix("10.0.0.0", sourceip, toInt(8)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("172.16.0.0", sourceip, toInt(12)) OR compareCIDRPrefix("192.168.0.0", sourceip, toInt(16)), "Private", "Public") as source_ip_type
| where dest_ip_type matches "Public" and source_ip_type matches "Private"
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where !(TAG matches "*DENY*")
| sum(bytesfromclient) as bytes_client by sourceip, destip
| bytes_client / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes_client
| fields -bytes_client
| sort gbytes_client
| limit 20

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall* *deny*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where TAG matches "*DENY*"
| timeslice 1m
| count as denied_traffic by _timeslice
| outlier denied_traffic

panels.title: Denied Traffic by Source and Destination Zones

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall* *deny*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where TAG matches "*DENY*"
| count as denies by sourcezonename, destzonename
| transpose row destzonename column sourcezonename
| sort destzonename asc

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall* *deny*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where TAG matches "*DENY*"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=destip
| count by destip, latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall* *deny*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where TAG matches "*DENY*"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=sourceip
| count by destip, latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall* *deny*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where TAG matches "*DENY*"
| count as denied_traffic

panels.title: Denied Traffic by Service Name Over Time (No 'NONE' Services)

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall* *deny*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| toLowerCase(servicename) as servicename
| where TAG matches "*DENY*"
| where !(servicename matches "none")
| timeslice 5m
| count as denies by _timeslice, servicename
| transpose row _timeslice column servicename

_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall* *deny*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| where TAG matches "*DENY*"
| count as denied_traffic by policyName
| sort denied_traffic
| limit 10

panels.title: Denied Traffic by Service Name (No 'NONE' Services)

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall* *deny*
| toUpperCase(TAG) as TAG
| toLowerCase(servicename) as servicename
| where TAG matches "*DENY*"
| where !(servicename matches "none")
| count as denies by servicename

panels.title: Threats are detected from Sumo Logic's threat intelligence feed from CrowdStrike

queries.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address _sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| sum(_count) as threats by ip_address
| sort threats
| limit 20

_view=threat_intel_ip_address _sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| sum(_count) as threats by malicious_confidence
| sort threats

_view=threat_intel_ip_address _sourcecategory=*juniperfirewall*
| if(isBlank(ip_address_types), "unknown", ip_address_types) as ip_address_types
| sum(_count) as threats by ip_address_types
| sort threats
